column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We thoroughly enjoyed our visit
column2: and I'm only deducting one star for a few dishes and some of the priciness. Since it's all tapas
column3: people are going to order a lot anyway
column4: so prices for each item should be reasonable. Our bill was $190 before tip for 5 of us. Now that we know what we like
column5: future trips can be planned a bit better. I see a date night with hubby in our future.
